response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects the substantial benefits it will bring to your endeavors and allows us to establish a long-term partnership. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can move forward together.", "product_price": 12000}
